actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Treasury Department; Office of U.S. Trade Representative; Urban Mass Transportation Administration; State Department; Commerce Department.
Subcommittee on International Finance (Banking). Hearings held.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Finance and Monetary Policy

official_title: A bill to prohibit assistance under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 for purchasers of capital equipment subsidized in violation of international agreement.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to prohibit Federal assistance for purchasers of capital equipment for mass rapid transportation subsidized in violation of the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade. Requires the Secretary to notify a recipient of the intent to withhold assistance and provide it with the opportunity to cure such violation.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit assistance under the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 for purchasers of capital equipment subsidized in violation of international agreement.
